author: Reuters Editorial
title: Ex-divs to take 8.1 points off FTSE 100 on April 5
text: LONDON, April 3 (Reuters) - The following FTSE 100 companies will go ex-dividend on Thursday, after which investors will no longer qualify for the latest dividend payout. According to Reuters calculations at current market prices, the effect of the resulting adjustment to prices by market-makers would take 8.12 points off the index.
